p: N-hydroxyethylacrylamide ester of dehydroabietic acid is a viscous, yellow liquid. It can be prepared from dehydroabietyl chloride and N-hydroxyethylacrylamide according to Scheme 13, prior to filtration, washing, drying and column chromatography [ 144]. It can be used as a monomer in thermoset system with soybean oil-based resin for coating and adhesive applications [ 144].
